message: Hey Arjun! Let's get started on creating a spec row in Smartsheet for our new feature. Do you have a specific feature in mind, or should I suggest one?
engineer: Hi Aanya! If you have a feature in mind, please go ahead and suggest it. I'm ready to get started.

Great! Let's work on a feature to enhance user authentication with two-factor authentication (2FA). 

Here's what I'm thinking for the acceptance criteria:
1. Users can enable 2FA via their account settings.
2. A verification code is sent to the user's registered email or phone.
3. Users must enter the correct code to complete the login process.

I'll start by checking our Smartsheet setup. Sound good?
engineer: Sounds perfect! Let me know once the Smartsheet setup is ready, and I'll proceed with creating the Linear issue.

message:
The Smartsheet setup is ready! I've added a row for our 2FA feature in the "User Profile Enhancements" sheet.

Now, you can go ahead and create the Linear issue. Let me know once it's done, and I'll ensure everything is linked up.

engineer: The Linear issue for the 2FA feature has been created. Here's the link: [TAP5-2829](https://linear.app/tap5/issue/TAP5-2829/enhance-user-authentication-with-two-factor-authentication-(2fa)).

Feel free to link it up with the Smartsheet row. Let me know if there's anything else you need!

arguments.title: Enhance User Authentication with Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
arguments.description:
**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. Users can enable 2FA via their account settings.
2. A verification code is sent to the user's registered email or phone.
3. Users must enter the correct code to complete the login process.

**Link to Smartsheet Row:** [User Profile Enhancements Sheet](https://smartsheet.com/user-profile-enhancements)

message: engineer: Perfect! Thanks for linking everything up. I'll keep the Linear issue updated as we progress. Let me know if there's anything else. 😊
Sounds great! I'll keep an eye on the Smartsheet side. If you need any more specs or updates, just give me a shout. Happy coding! 🚀
engineer: Thanks, Aanya! I'll dive into the coding. Reach out anytime for updates or if you have more specs. 🚀
You're welcome, Arjun! I'll be here if you need anything. Happy coding! 😊
engineer: Appreciate it, Aanya! Catch you later. 😊
Catch you later, Arjun! Have a great day! 😊
engineer: You too, Aanya! Take care! 😊
